item.title: Masters Of The Universe CinemaCon BTS Footage Shows Accurate Costumes & Impressive Practical Effects
item.description: At CinemaCon, Amazon shares BTS footage for the upcoming live-action movie Masters of the Universe, which is set to release in 2026.

item.title: Mercy CinemaCon Trailer Description: Chris Pratt Has 90 Minutes To Save Himself From Execution
item.description: Chris Pratt and Rebecca Ferguson's upcoming science-fiction movie, Mercy, receives a new update at CinemaCon during Amazon MGM's panel.

item.title: After The Hunt CinemaCon Trailer Description: "Not Everything Is Supposed To Make You Comfortable"
item.description: Luca Guadagnino's After the Hunt, which stars Julia Roberts, Ayo Edebiri, and Andrew Garfield, has shown its first trailer at CinemaCon.
